metadata.dc:author: García Mateos, D
de Benito Cordón, L P
Ruiz Climente, M
Marchena Yglesias, P J
Hervás Laguna, M J
metadata.dc:description: We present a case report of a Latin-American patient with dilated cardiomyopathy due to chronic Chagas disease satisfactorily treated with usual cardiologic support. We report a new aetiology of heart failure which is uncommon in our country but could rise due to immigration from endemic countries.
metadata.dc:title: Miocardiopatía chagásica: una causa de insuficiencia cardiaca de origen infeccioso.
[Chagasic myocardiopathy: an infectious etiology of congestive heart failure].
